p: The sample collected by us in Sivas province was characterised with quit rather content of monoterpenes (14.9%) with predominance of Î±-pinene (12.5%). However, the plant sample collected in Kayseri province did not contain monoterpenes at all. In addition, acetophenone was also not mentioned in the previous report [22]. High percentage of acetophenone (7.5%) was found in EO from fresh leaves of P. umbrosa Turcz. [39].
